document_data.name: Trenzia
document_data.mainbody: '''Trenzia''' was one of [[Halaster]]'s new apprentices in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History: At one point before [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Trenzia was chosen by Halaster to be one of his new apprentices. At one point, to expand her scientific and necromantic research, she asked Halaster to transform her into a [[flameskull]] and Halaster agreed, also granting her a lair inside the [[Arcane Chambers]].
document_data.Activities: Trenzia was busy with her experiments in [[necromancy]] and electricity using [[copper]], and was assisted by a [[flesh golem]].
document_data.Personality: Trenzia was driven mad by her researches and sacrificed her own body to construct a device that fused necromancy and electricity.
document_data.Relationship: Trenzia had become paranoid about the other apprentices of Halaster, believing that they couldn't understand her genius.
